name: online-quiz-game
description: **Endpoint(URL):** `/api/v1/auth/register` \ **Request Method:** POST \ Request Body ```json { "username": , "email": , "password": } ``` Success Response Body ```json { "success": "true", "user": { "id": , "username": } } ``` Failure Response Body (Bad Request) ```json { "success": "false", "message": "Please provide username, email, password!" } ```
